entry.title: Pretty in Pink Party Dress Up Kit for Little Girls
entry.s:type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Roses And Teacups
Type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
Price: 23.99

Our Pretty in Pink Party Dress Up Kit for Little Girls perfect is perfect for the little princess in your life. She will love dressing up for play, tea parties, birthday and more. Includes hat adorned with pretty feathers and rose, a faux white pearl necklace, pink feather boa, and dainty lace gloves.

entry.title: Deluxe Rose White Lace Child Size Half Apron Perfect for Little Girls
entry.s:type: Victorian Pinafore Aprons
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dutch Novelties
Type: Victorian Pinafore Aprons
Price: 14.99

Our children's Deluxe Rose Lace Half Apron have lovely embroidered lace scrolling along the bottom edge. Perfect for children 8-12 Great for tea parties, dress up and helping in the kitchen.

This apron measures 17.5" from top to hemline.  50% Cotton 50% Poly.  Machine Washable.

entry.title: Children or Small Ladies Victorian Tea Party Hat #203
entry.s:type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
Price: 59.99

Girl's Designer Victorian Tea Party Hat Antique Children's or Small adult with Antique Print Victorian hat. This hat is a smaller version of our Ladies Victorian Touring hat. Inside size of hat is 21". It has a pleated antique floral chiffon top with antique mauve flowers in front with a antique mauve feather and a ribbon/satin bow on side. Finished off with an English antique netting bow on back.

This hat is made just for you at the time of the order.  There are several steps involved in creating your hat that do require extra time such as hand dyeing and drying your embellishments plus the hand assembly.  These are made in the USA by a very talented artist that has carried on the creative talents of her mother.  This is not a hat that sits getting dusty on a shelf!  This is something special made just for you or your loved one as a gift she'll never forget! The turn around time for this process is usually 1-2 weeks but she is usually very quick.
